review_text: Small but comfortable…the bathroom was a little tight but otherwise nice home!
The place was lovely and the location was perfect!
We had a great stay, with easy access to the Bourbon Trail and walkable to downtown Bardstown. Highly recommend.

We had a great two night stay in Bardstown for the PGA Championship! Lianne’s communication leading up to the trip was great. The house was SO clean and smelled so good upon arrival. Walkable to all places downtown. The house is small, but we found it very comfortable for two couples. Would love to return for a bourbon trail weekend :).
Avery House is in a excellent location and had everything we needed! Will stay here again next time I come to Bardstown.
This is our second time staying at the Avery House. It’s in a quiet neighborhood that is an easy walk to the downtown shops and restaurants. Our favorite place to stay in Bardstown. We will be back!
Great house! Walkable to Bardstown restaurants and convienent to the distilleries. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

This is a lovely little house in a great location, walking distance to the Main Street with cute restaurants and stores.
The house was super clean and well kept. Lianne was a pleasure to communicate with.
Thank you for having us, Lianne.

Charming 2 bedroom home near Bardstown and so much more. Lianne kept us updated on Check-in the day before and let us know when the home was ready to occupy. Great location and cozy home full of thoughtful amenities.
Amazing stay, close to everything we wanted to do. Felt right at home.

We had a great time at Lianne’s place! It was close to everything and just a walk to down town! Beautiful neighborhood and very clean house that always smelled good when you walked in and the sheets were so soft I wanted them for our house! Lianne was so responsive even when it was 10:30 pm! We left from NC and went half way to WV just to find out a tornado hit the town and there wasn’t power or a hotel for 2 hours away. We texted Lianne and she let us add a day to our stay and our panic quickly left! We appreciate everything and our stay was great. I can’t wait to come back!
Great place, close walk to downtown! Home had everything we needed.

We loved every aspect of our stay. This is a perfect location to access the restaurants and activities Bardstown has to offer. The house was one of the most thoughtfully appointed Airbnbs we’ve stayed in. It had everything! It’s a small space, but very adequate and so well designed that it was perfect for us. The host was very communicative and super friendly. Lovely stay!
Fantastic location. Walkable to multiple bars and restaurants. Wonderful central location to many of the distilleries on the bourbon trail!

We stayed for a couple days and it was perfect! Great location if you want to check out the bourbon trail. Lianne was very responsive and the place was immaculate. I would definitely return if I come back to Bardstown!
great place and helpful host.

Absolutely loved my stay. The house is clean, updated, comfortable and walking distance from great restaurants and bars. Lianne was responsive and extremely accommodating when I needed to add an extra night to my stay. Highly recommend!
Love, love, love this place. It is exactly as described and shown in the listing. Love that it’s walkable but also in a quiet part of town. Lianne is a very helpful and responsive host.
Very nice Airbnb! We stayed for two nights and went to heaven hill and bardstown bourbon then spent the rest of our time in the little town. We had a great weekend and would definitely stay again!
Wonderful place perfectly situated to everything in town. Well appointed, clean, and cozy!! Lianne was extremely responsive, kind, and helpful! Def recommend.
Thanks for a great stay. Enjoyed the location and had a great time.

Lianne’s place was great to stay in and very clean. We loved the holiday decorations and overall it felt very inviting. Lianne was highly responsive to messages.
Overall - I would highly recommend staying here!

This Airbnb was perfect for my boyfriend and I. The house was very close to town and it's only a short walk to restaurants and bars. I recommend this Airbnb if you are looking for something cozy and clean. We enjoy our stay and hopefully others will too. We will definitely come back in the future!!
We absolutely adored this place. 10/10 recommend. It was so clean and cozy, walkable to everything. We had such a fun weekend. Will definitely return.
Enjoyed our stay in this cute little house!

Everything was as described. Lianne was proactive with providing instructions and making sure we checked in with no problems. Area is amazing and everything is within walking distance. Super quiet neighborhood and friendly people. Highly recommended and would stay here again!
Avery House was a great place to stay! It was an adorable little house, very clean, and a great location. We loved that we were able to walk to the downtown area! We would definitely recommend it!
This house was the perfect place to spend a cozy weekend on the Bourbon Trail. It was a great fit for 2 couples and we all felt right at home!

The Avery house was charming and comfortable. It was everything one could want for a few days away. The cottage was exactly as the photos and was very clean.
The easy stroll through the lovely neighborhood to get to down town Bardstown was an added bonus. All the surrounding homes were decorated for Fall and it felt like you were walking into a Hallmark movie😊. I would definitely recommend Lianne’s place and stay again while in Bardstown.
We loved our stay at this cozy little cottage. The location is perfect, close enough to walk downtown but still very quiet and private. It was immaculately kept and very comfortable.
Lianne's house was great! my wife and I stayed there for a couple of nights during our bourbon tour. it's easily walkable to all of the restaurants, shops, and bars. Great spot in a cool town!

Lianne's place was easy to find, easy parking, quiet, clean, and decorated well. Bedding was comfortable and pristine. The location is just a few streets away from the center of town, so easy to find things to do and places to go
Lianne was communicative and gave plenty of information and advice.
Would easily recommend the host and the property. Thanks for a great experience.
Beautiful home. Clean and close to town. Would stay here again.
Beautiful home in walking distance of downtown!

Had a wonderful time in Bardstown and enjoyed our stay at Avery House. Lianne let me know all the details up front so i had no need to contact her during our stay. But I imagine she is super responsive too! She was even kind enough to let us know many shops and restaurants would be closed on Sunday and Monday. Helped us plan ahead better! Look forward to staying here again.
5 stars across the board- will definitely be back!

We had a wonderful stay. The house is small, but very livable, with comfy chairs and a nice tv with streaming services. The kitchen is one of the best equipped I’ve seen in airbnb homes. The house is in a perfect location for checking out restaurants and shops in the little downtown area. The host provides snacks, coffee pods, and other welcoming treats, and she is easy to contact with questions. There are two bedrooms with queen beds in each, so it nominally sleeps four, but there is only one very tiny bathroom, so I’d recommend it for only two guests. All in all, an excellent host and comfortable, lovely house.
Great place to stay in Bardstown, can walk to all restaurants etc!

We loved Lianne's home! It was perfect location for our bourbon tours. The house was clean, neat and nicely decorated and just so inviting. We will definitely stay at Lianne's place again. The only downside was that the town of Bardstown is very quiet on Mondays and we were unable to find a restaurant to eat dinner. We had to travel a bit outside of town to eat on Monday. Other than that, Bardstown is great and the people are so friendly.
Cute, quirky, comfortable. So much to see in Bardstown, we'll just have to come back. Would book again in a heartbeat.

Our stay was so cozy and nice. We really loved how high quality and soft the sheets were, how comfy the couch was, and the included games.
We didn’t use it much, but the kitchen was also very nice and well stocked.
Lianne also let us check in early, which was a real blessing with our travel schedule.

Wonderful, cozy home. It was a perfect place for 4 adults to stay while in town for the Kentucky Bourbon Festival. We couldn’t have asked for anything better. Located in a quiet neighborhood and walkable to the festival, downtown shops, restaurants, and church on Sunday morning at the Basilica of St. Joseph.
The linens on the bed were extremely soft, and I appreciated the fans in the rooms.
Lianne was a great communicator throughout the process.
Would absolutely stay at the Avery House again!
Very clean and comfortable, Lianne was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Great central location. Highly recommended.

We had a great visit to Bardstown, Lianne's house was extremely clean and within walking distance to all the shops and restaurants in Bardstown. It is a short drive to the distilleries in the Bardstown area. We would stay there again. A great experience from check-in to check-out, Lianne was very helpful.
provided the perfect spot after a day roaming bourbon country to come back to and relax

We enjoyed our stay at The Avery House. It was very comfortable, extremely clean, and nicely decorated. We loved it as soon as we entered the house and immediately noticed the pleasant and welcoming scent. Lianne was a great, responsive host and provided everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. We would definitely stay at The Avery House again if we come back to Bardstown.
Great place close to town. Very clean and well maintained.
Small place as described, but met our needs. Was very clean. Easy to walk downtown. Very responsive host.
We enjoyed our stay at Lianne's home. It was clean, organized and had great touches throughout to make our stay comfortable.
Great little home, close to everything. Responsive host, clean house. I’d definitely stay here again!
We had a great stay and when we come back to Bardstown we would stay again! Well stocked house and great linens on the beds. Very homey!!

This was our first visit to Bardstown and the "Bourbon Trail". We couldn't have asked for a better place to call home for the weekend. We have traveled extensively throughout the country over the last 30 years and we were very impressed with our rental.
We would describe the home as "small but mighty" in its accommodations and amenities. Beautiful and charming and very much a "we're home" feel. It was very clean and we loved it.
We didn't have nearly enough time to visit and see everything we wanted to do over the weekend, but did manage to get in a dinner train ride on the Old Kentucky Railroad, distillery visits to Woodford Reserve, Makers Mark, Log Still (with the Elle King concert at The Amp), and Buffalo Trace. We also had lunch at Bardstown Burger (yummy!) and attended church services at the Basilica of St. Joseph.
So...we'll be back to Bardstown and hopefully a return stay very soon!
Thanks again Lianne!
Very cute space, had everything we needed. Comfy beds and bedrooms separated for nice privacy. Walking distance to everything in Bardstown and great central location to area attractions.

This spot in Bardstown was perfect for 2 couples as we worked our way through the bourbon trail over the course of a long weekend. Being close to the heart of Bardstown was great during the times we weren't journeying too far, and the space itself was relaxing and extremely private for it being so close to the main drag. Being a relatively quick drive to Louisville was a major plus as well! We will definitely look to book again if in town.
A comfortable home in a great location to tour distilleries and enjoy the beautiful countryside, I highly recommend!

Lianne’s place is awesome. Quiet neighborhood and a short walk to downtown. Very nicely decorated, clean throughout and well stocked with all amenities you would need. I would definitely tell my friends to book this place for a trip to Bardstown.
Great little house with many thoughtful touches. Would stay again.

The Avery house is absolutely fantastic across the board. Every facet of what you’re looking for in an AirBnB is perfectly curated for a comfortable and easygoing stay. Everything is within walking distance which is a huge plus for me/us on our Bardstown visit. We will absolutely be making the Avery house our go-to spot when we come back to Bardstown in the future. Thank you thank you thank you Lianne!

This house was perfect for our stay in Bardstown. We loved that we could walk into the historic downtown. When we ventured out, it was very close to the other attractions. The house was very clean and comfortable. Lianne had the kitchen stocked with all kinds of treats. She was the perfect host and very responsive to the couple of questions we had. We certainly would stay here again and highly recommend it to others.

Lianne was a very gracious host. the house had everything we needed and snacks. 😁
the house was in a perfect location to walk to the heart of Bardstown. it was a private and very peaceful neighborhood.
Communication was great. Easy checkin and checkout.

Avery House was everything we expected! Bardstown is such a quaint place and our stay there was wonderful! This two bedroom cottage has everything you need! Very well appointed and many accessories for extra comfort! It is a quiet place and within walking distance to town. The hosts were easy to contact and helped out when we had a problem with the TV. I would definitely recommend Avery House to friends and family, who are visiting in the area!
A great host! Thank you for the lovely stay!

We just returned from another fabulous stay at the Avery House! Spotlessly clean (as usual), amazingly comfortable, and beautifully decorated…we always feel so at home there. Lianne is a truly a great host! She has thought of everything a guest could possibly need during their stay. Great communication, too! Lianne messaged me a few days before our stay, and continued communicating with us until the day after checkout. Everything about our stay was just perfect, and we will definitely book again on our next trip to Bardstown! Thank you, Lianne, for sharing your beautiful home with us again!
Beautiful house with great downtown location!
Perfect location to downtown Bardstown.

One of the best stays we’ve had! House is beautiful and walkable to downtown. Recommend Scout and Scholar. The place was spotless and had any amenities you would need. Lianne was great and extremely responsive and helpful!

This was an excellent place to stay in Bardstown! You are right next to the downtown area so there is plenty to do and it is all walkable. The place is the perfect size for 4 or less people and it is very clean and nice. We would recommend this place and would happily stay here again!
Great home in a really historic area! Easy to walk to everything!!

We were very pleased with The Avery house. It was an easy walk to downtown shops and restaurants but far enough away to feel private. The neighborhood is lovely with lots of history. Lianne was extremely friendly and responsive during the entire process. We would love to rent here again on our next visit to Bardstown!
Amazing! We definitely stay there again.

Just hit the book button!!
It’s a fabulous house within a safe neighborhood within walking distance to the cutest downtown and restaurants. Everything you need is in the house and Laurie responds so quickly that should we have needed anything I wouldn’t have hesitated to ask. Extra blankets (I’m always cold), fans for white noise, appliances galore, good safe parking, mown lawn and manicured garden.
We were 2 couples on the bourbon trail for a little under a week and the house was perfect for making breakfasts and relaxing at night. Thank you for the experience. Hit the book button!

Our stay at The Avery House was Awesome! Very nice home in a nice neighborhood. The inside was very clean and wife and I loved the way it was decorated and all the furnishings. The host Lianne communicated with us thru the whole process and made it very easy👍🏻 The home and host are 5 ⭐️ in my opinion. Bardstown is a very neat place to visit and if you are looking for a place to stay look no further! Highly recommended👍🏻😁

Perfect location to Main St in Bardstown! Walking distance to local shops, restaurants, and cafes! Super cute place!
It was a perfect house to stay at while exploring the Bourbon Trail!

This place is a little home away from home in a darling area of town. Lots of homey touches, helpfully labelled items, extras for hygiene etc. Things were easy to find, and we felt relaxed here. Stay here!

We had a great stay. The place was clean and comfortable. I took a wonderful walk around the neighborhood and downtown one evening. We loved Mammy’s for breakfast and for dinner both The Bar at Willet and Toogie’s. The house is a great place to stay while visiting the local Bourbon distilleries.

We had a great time at Avery House! Perfect little house for the three in our party and would work great with four as well. Centrally located and great amenities within. Very kind and responsive host. Would love to come back and stay again!

We had a wonderful stay. We were impressed from the second we stepped in the door.
The hosts were really friendly and thoughtful and left lots of perfect extras.
The house was spotless and very high quality bedding, towels, equipment is provided.
It's walking distance from the dinner train and also the town, where there is plenty to do.
An exceptional host and home, which is just what we needed.
Great location and easy to walk to downtown. The space was beautiful and exactly like the pictures. Comfortable bed and the kitchen had everything you need.

Lianne was a wonderful host...very responsive and friendly. Her house is so charming and felt like home. It is very well-equipped with everything one could need, and then some! The neighborhood is quiet yet within walking distance of the lovely downtown area and restaurants.
Great location close to downtown Bardstown- within walking distance to many shops, restaurants, and bars. House was comfy and clean. Would definitely recommend staying here!

This home was absolutely perfect, it was super clean and beautifully decorated! The location is walking distance to downtown Bardstown. Lianne, the host, was on top of her game with very detailed instructions and wonderful communication!
Stayed for 2 nights ... everything as advertised. Lianne was very helpful and kind in our messaging. No problems at all. Would stay here on our next visit.
We had a great stay at Lianne’s place. Very peaceful neighborhood, but located within blocks of everything. A++++ thanks!
Cozy home and decor! Also had the cleanest floors of any Airbnb I have ever stayed in. The guest book was a very nice touch as well!
Very nice place and conveniently located.
Great place! Super clean. Lianne is a phenomenal host & very responsive and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay while on the Bourbon Trail. 10/10 recommend.

Cozy, quaint and just right. A few short blocks from downtown. Quiet neighborhood. House had everything one would need. Host is wonderful and provides immediate responses, although we did not need her for anything other than to confirm check in. Would highly recommend this home for a great get away.
Lots of great little touches, like having a blue tooth speaker, because we forgot ours as usual.
Beautiful little house, walking distance to the square. Host easy to contact if we had any questions, over all enjoy the stay.

Needed a new place short notice after our original place wasn’t what it was promised. Is a quaint guest house that is perfect for a few day stay. Was everything promised and is an older home but it was nice to have TV’s in each bedroom and the main area. Our request was accepted before we made it out of the previous place which I am grateful for as we had nowhere else to go. Would definitely stay again!

Avery House was great. It was very well appointed and spotless. Amenities were ample, from the coffee and snacks to the basket of “extras” in the bathroom. The house felt like home and was a great home base on our Bourbon Trail trip. Lianne was also a wonderful host, giving us information in advance and being very responsive to messages.
What a great place to stay for relaxing and enjoying the beautiful town and surrounding areas of Bardstown!

This was one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had in a while. The house was perfect- clean, comfortable, warm, and well-equipped. Lianne was very easy to communicate with, and we didn't have any problems at all. Highly recommend and would absolutely come back!

Highly recommend this amazing home! A beautiful and very clean place to stay. We felt cozy and right at home! The location is perfect for everything down town.. so much to choose from. We needed more days to enjoy it all! Lianne is very responsive. Check in and check out was very easy! If you’re going to Bardstown, this is the place to stay! (If you’re going in or out the side door, be careful…. I smashed my finger. Lol)
Great house close to downtown!
We loved our stay at Lianne’s place! Super clean and took no time to get to downtown. We will definitely be staying here again!
Charming house - well decorated, clean, and perfectly setup for guests to enjoy a trip to Bardstown. Definitely a short walk to everything.

Great place for our party of four adults. Very close to downtown area which has many restaurants and shops within walking distance. Central location for the bourbon distilleries we visited. The home was very clean and comfortable. We would definitely book a stay here if we return. Very easy checkout. Thank you for allowing us to stay in your sweet home that was decorated for the holidays. 🎄🥃🎄🎅🤶🎄🎄

The Avery House is such a great place to stay if you want to experience Bardstown. Several distilleries are just minutes away and you are only a 5 min walk from the town square. The house is very clean, parking is easy, and Lianne is a wonderful host. This was my second time at the Avery House and it won’t be my last.
This home is very clean, comfortable and close to everything! We enjoyed our stay

Avery house was very charming, cozy, clean, decorated so lovely and well maintained. The house had everything you could want and more. The amenities, supplies, appliances and comfort items were way above standard. Lianne was absolutely fantastic with communicating before we arrived and we were even able to check in a little early. House is very close and you can to walk to downtown Bardstown where there are lots of gift shops and restaurants. Can’t wait to come back to Avery House.

Lianne and her home are amazing! This is our go-to house each time we are in Bardstown. We leave our car at the house and walk everywhere. It’s conveniently located just blocks from everything - restaurants, shops, parks, etc.
Also, Lianne has thought of everything you might need - hair dryer, toiletries you forgot, ice machine, snacks, coffee, the list goes on and on.
This adorable house is the perfect place for a single family or two couples and Lianne ensures it’s a flawless stay every time. She’s very responsive to all communication and - though we’ve never met - it feels like staying with an old friend each time we come. Thank you, Lianne, for another perfect stay!
Perfect place to stay for the weekend! We had a flawless and easy trip!
Quite location with-in easy walking distance to downtown shops & restaurants. Very drivable location to Bourbon Trail. Nicely decorated and comfortable. Easy and timely communication
Great home located within walking distance to downtown. Would stay here again and again!

This home was so clean, cozy, well stocked and in a great location! Lianne was such a wonderful host! Great communication! We would highly recommend this home for others traveling for the bourbon trail or just passing through.

This place is cute, cozy and comfortable! The location was ideal. We enjoyed exploring downtown Bardstown which was within walking distance. Also great proximity to the Bourbon trail. Lianne was an excellent hostess.
Great location to downtown. Comfortable and welcoming home to stay in. Would look to stay here again!

Great house!! Nicely decorated and very comfy!! In a great location. Walking distance to downtown where there are great restaurants and shops. Would definitely stay here again. Hostess was very quick to respond to any questions.

This is a real gem of a place - beautifully decorated, conveniently located and welcoming. The decor is colorful and charming. I loved the kitchen and bright red fridge. The host is very helpful and responsive — we felt well cared for. One of the nicest experiences I’ve had!

Everything about this home was perfect. The Home was spotless, beds were comfortable, cozy and warm space, everything you could possibly need and want, special touches, beautiful decor, great location within walking distance to downtown, etc. Great communication with the host. I can't say enough good things about the Avery House. Our stay was perfect and we can't wait to return! Thank you Lianne for sharing your home with us and being such a great host!
Wonderful host; cute home within walking distance of all great places !
A vey nice cozy place to stay. Clean and comfortable. Our host Lianne was available to answer questions quickly. We would stay here again.
Charming little home in nice neighborhood. Little touches like a few snacks and bottled water was much appreciated and the ice machine was an added benefit. The refrigerator is super cute
Great house in a terrific walk-to location. Super clean and comfortable. It was a wonderful home base for our week on the bourbon trail. Strongly recommend and would definitely come back!
Nice house for 4 adults. Very clean and comfy. Great location. Walking distance to everything in Bardstown. Central location for distilleries and Churchill Downs.
We had a great time visiting Bardstown! This home was in a great location, close to everything. The home was well appointed, comfortable and cozy. The perfect stay.
House was very well appointed. Only thing better than the house itself was the location. Walkable to a to you want within minutes. Communication was great. Would absolutely recommend
This home is lovely! It’s cozy, comfortable and every detail was thought of. And the location is perfect. We would definitely stay there again!

This was my first time using Airbnb and this place was perfect. Such a warm cozy atmosphere. The owner has taken every effort to ensure everything is perfect. Highly recommend this place. Beautiful home.
Wow great rental in a fab location you won’t be disappointed exactly as described. Go enjoy and explore the gem that is Bardstown.
The Avery House is great!!!! Have stayed twice. Will definitely stay again. Very hospitable, charming and definitely within walking distance to everything.

Cute home in the heart of Bardstown and bourbon country. Two couples stayed for a holiday weekend getaway to tour bourbon country. House was spotless and exactly as described in the listing. Walk yo town for restaurants and shops. Several distilleries near town and others are within an hour drive. Communication from Lianne was amazing and would definitely recommend this home for a great getaway trip!
Cute house! Within walking distance to everything, we loved it!
This cottage was perfect for us. Extremely clean and quiet. Location was wonderful.
The Avery House is perfect in every aspect! Well appointed, super location and a wonderful host in Lianne! This was our second stay and we will be back again.

The house was great for our long weekend in Bardstown. Situated close to downtown, walks to and from establishments were fantastic! The little extras provided during our stay were very much appreciated!
Adorable place and very clean! The bed was comfortable, the towels are plush, and the kitchen is well stocked. Great getaway for couples or small family. We would stay again!
Great Place to Stay in Bardstown. Newly remodeled, very well decorated and in walking distance of restaurants.
Beautiful home and every little detail was taken into consideration. Amazing hosts and perfect for my friend and I for this trip.
This house is adorable! We loved staying here and the location was perfect in Bardstown.

This was the perfect location to visit with friends in Downtown Bardstown! The home was clean, well equipped with everything you may need. Communication with owner was awesome! They always were quick to respond and provided information about local activities. Definitely a great place worth visiting again!!!
This place is very charming and has everything you need. Very clean!! Is a perfect location to walk around town. Definitely would stay again. Great hosts.
Great location — within walking distance to downtown Bardstown and just a short drive to many distilleries!
Perfect place for our family! Host was great and the location was amazing! Would definitely stay again!

Great place to stay in Bardstown. Walk to everything.
The house had everything you could need
Lianne was very helpful and was great to communicate with.
What a cozy place to stay with all of the comforts of home! The home is pristine and the amenities are top notch. We would definitely recommend!
She is easy to contact and make sure everything is as or better than expected. You are guaranteed to have a great time with Lianne at the helm!
Excellent spot to stay for checking out all Bardstown has to offer. The place is clean, comfortable, and fully equipped. Highly recommended to anyone looking to explore bourbon country.

Wow. Lianne has thought of everything! You are within a few blocks walk of shops, restaurants, breweries, etc. The house is in a quiet, safe neighborhood and we felt at home the minute we got there. We cannot wait to come back!
Super cute home and we would absolutely stay again.

I stayed here the weekend of my wedding and it was amazing! Super close and convenient to things in town. The house was so cute with a lot of helpful information about local things. I don’t know what more you would want with a stay somewhere! The host was so sweet and helpful.

We chose the Avery house to stay for the week to celebrate our 13th anniversary this is on such a nice quite street with in walking distance to great food and shops we only moved our truck when things were to far away but loved being able to walk uptown for breakfast or what ever else we wanted they have truly thought of everything to make you fell like you are at home would most definitely stay here again

What a charming little house in a great location! Lianne was a wonderful, responsive host. Check-in was a breeze. The house was immaculate with great amenities. This was a great place to stay. Thank you Lianne!

This is the ideal home to stay in if you are visiting Bardstown specifically or Louisville. Beautiful location, incredibly clean and well designed interior. Communication was prompt and very helpful. It’s walking distance to many shops and restaurants in a great neighborhood. We will definitely be staying here again next time we visit!
Great place to stay! Everything was great!

Absolutely perfect house and location! If you are looking for someplace within walking distance to everything in downtown Bardstown, this is the place.
Very cozy and very, very clean. The host Lianne, is very attentive to your needs and her communication throughout the renting process was wonderful. My husband and I really enjoyed our stay and found this to be a great homebase for some of the Bourbon tours. We would definitely stay here again.
We enjoyed our stay in Bardstown. We were within walking distance of downtown and the house was great.

This property is a wonderful place to stay! It was super clean, bright and cheerful. We really liked the kitchen since we cooked most of our meals, very functional, and even a washer and dryer! I would definitely stay her again!

Lianne's place was cozy, clean, close to everything, and perfectly met our needs during my mom and I's girls getaway for my birthday. Lianne had excellent communication before, during, and after our stay. She has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable and ensure you have everything you need. Lovely area, super cute place, and we really enjoyed Bardstown and everything in the area to do or experience. We would definitely return in the future.
Wonderful stay at this cozy home! Well-stocked with home necessities, and close to all things food and bourbon. Couldn’t have asked for a better home-away-from home for the weekend!

This is a great little house near the village. It was convenient to walk to the Main Street for shopping and restaurants. The house was newly remodeled and very clean. The off street parking worked really well even with a large truck. We enjoyed our short stay.

The listing was exactly as advertised, a short walk to every place in Bardstown. We made a reservation at the Rickhouse, was able to walk there quickly and enjoy an amazing dinner then went to have drinks at Scout & Scholar. It is a small house that is thoughtfully designed, comfortable, and is everything we expected it to be. Will be trying to stay here again for our next trip to Bardstown!
Great location! The Avery House is so cozy. The beds are super comfortable and Lianne pays such close attention to detail. Highly recommend staying here for your trip to Bardstown!

Lianne’s place was extremely clean and had lots of amenities. The location is a perfect walk to downtown Bardstown restaurants and shops. Lianne had suggestions for everything and it made everything so convenient for us. Her place is awesome and we would like to go back soon. I was having trouble finding an event on the TV and Lianne had her husband call me to walk me though. Above and beyond plus he was a pleasure to talk too. You couldn’t ask for better hospitality from Lianne and her husband! They were great people to book with and we thank them for sharing their home with us!

The Avery House was perfect for a long weekend on the Bourbon Trail. It is very well appointed, comfortable, clean and convenient to the Bardstown area's best. Lianne has thought of everything you might need and is attentive with communication.
Make sure you get up early and walk down the street for pastries from Hadorn's! If you're a runner, the house is a good spot to start and end an early morning run around the mostly flat town. The Rickhouse has delicious steaks and a scrumptious chocolate bourbon bread pudding.
Great place for us to day trip from. Cute touches throughout made it a comfortable stay.

Avery House was the perfect home base for our bourbon trail adventure. The home is conveniently located a short walk to the quaint historic town and within an hour drive to many distilleries. The home is fresh and clean as well as perfectly decorated and appointed for all your needs. We will be back.

We highly recommend On The Rocks and will be booking again soon...CHEERS!
Great place in a great location.

This is our 3rd stay with JT and co-host, our first stay at this particular list. You can’t go wrong staying with this group or either location!! You can JT and his co-host take great pride in their listings!! Can’t wait to come back!!! Thanks again for he best stay!!!!

Very cozy and peaceful home. Great design. Beautiful land with horses and close drive to town, but private and quiet neighborhood. The hosts were also great to communicate with, and very accommodating with check in and check out. Plan to stay again next time we visit the area!

J.T.’s was an absolute perfect fit for us.
The home had beautiful surroundings and was a Short drive to everything we wanted to see in the area.
I value great communication and they were amazing! Loved the horses greeting us as well ❤️ So peaceful there. Definitely will pass this place and hosts on to friends if they are in the area
This place is fantastic. I absolutely recommend it. It is peaceful and perfect. Great place
It was our second stay here. We love staying here. It’s so peaceful and beautiful nestled in the heart of the bourbon capital. We can’t wait to come back again!

Everything was great!

Cheers!

Great stay!

Couples trip on the Bourbon Trail. Appreciated the thoughtful amenities and layout. So peaceful and relaxing. Ironically, we ended up not doing any of the Bardstown distilleries, yet still perfect for day trips to Frankfort, Lexington, and Loretto.
On the rocks was the perfect location for our weekend away! The kitchen was well stocked, beds were comfy, and the host was fabulous! Would absolutely stay again!
On the Rocks is a cute house, perfect for two couples or a family. We sat out back and enjoyed the end of our day. The horses were fun and very friendly! Will definitely stay there again.

My husband, dog, and I absolutely loved staying here. The home was very comfortable and inviting and was the perfect place to relax after exploring Bardstown. The house was beautiful and clean. The horses were a big plus, love them. JT and everyone involved was extremely helpful and responded immediately with any questions or concerns. They went above and beyond. Hopefully we will be back.

My wife and I stayed with another couple on the first night of our kid-free vacation. On the Rocks was just what we needed! We liked the comfortable, spacious layout. I would encourage other guests coming to visit the Bourbon Trail to stay here (unless it's the same time we want to come back in the future; then you should definitely stay somewhere else).
We have stayed here several times and every time our stay has been perfect. We love staying here.
The house was very nice. Very peaceful and beautiful yard. Enjoyed the treats. Was easy to find and check-in was easy.
Highly recommend staying here!
great place, very peaceful, very clean. We would definitely come back

Destination clean & peaceful; exactly as represented.

We absolutely loved our time here! The house was a perfect way to start and end each day on our bourbon tour. The horses were friendly and there to greet us! Would definitely recommend staying here.

On the Rocks exceeded our expectations! It was a beautiful location for this cute home. Everything was just right for a great visit. Decorated perfectly, spotless and very comfortable. We will definitely be back!
Great spot to explore the bourbon trail or even just to enjoy the serene quiet amidst horses & geese at the table out back! Will stay here if possible on the next visit!

Beautifully renovated home. Very peaceful, but close enough to town. The horses made a visit, and the sounds of animals while drinking coffee in the morning was wonderful. Beds comfy, equipped kitchen, and very clean. Would definitely stay again.
lovely place.

Loved it!! Will definitely go back

"On the "Rocks" is a peaceful getaway. Very clean and newly refurbished. Loved the horses in the backyard. They were friendly and came over. Beautiful and peaceful location. Enjoyed the patio area overlooking the farm. The horses came by daily and it was fun to feed them. JT’s home was very clean and comfortable. Favorite Airbnb in the area! Thanks again for the great stay!

This is an amazing place to say to do everything Bardstown, Louisville, and Bourbon trail related ! Super clean and nice and quiet and relaxing after a long drive or long days touring and walking ! Enjoyed our stay here for a long weekend. The home is beautiful and very clean! We loved feeding the horses as well. We had a great experience staying here!
perfecr location! Very close to town but private and peaceful. Everythingwas as described and we loved the house, horses, and fire pit! I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

We thoroughly enjoyed On the Rocks. Very comfortable and private. Easy drive into Bardstown. Being in the country was very relaxing and we enjoyed the horses and other pets.

On the Rocks is a peaceful place at the end of the road. Very clean with everything we needed. A wonderful space!! Make it your choice if you’re heading to the Bourbon Trail!!!

Great place to stay, we were 2 couples and we loved the home and it’s amenities. When the weather allowed, it was nice to sit outside on the patio. Short drive to all the things we wanted to do.

Our family loved our stay at the "House on the Rocks". The house was extremely clean and had everything we needed. There was a lot to do / see within an hour drive. Our children loved feeding the horses everyday!

Ideal location for touring the Bourbon Trail. Close to restaurants, shopping but not right in town. Quiet and private location.

Great house near Bardstown. Perfect for two couples. The house was very clean, and updated. We would definitely stay here again.
